special_text:
[i](As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. It gains abilities when it’s at certain defense or below.)[/i]
Whenever a creature you don’t control attacks, that creature’s controller loses 1 life.
[b]3 Defense[/b] Stage 2
Whenever a creature you control attacks, defending player loses 1 life.
[b]Defeated[/b] Stage 3
Whenever an opponent loses life, you gain 1 life.
